{{knowledge objective

|Rank=B
|Title=Photograph of Papilledema
|Description=None
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=
|Order=13}}

[[File:OP.jpg|left|vignette|Papillary edema of the right eye. In this photo, the papilla appears blurred, in relief, and it is not possible to draw its border. When we say that the papilla is "sharp-edged", it is to express the absence of papilloedema.|434x434px]]

question.question: What is a characteristic of papilloedema in the photograph shown?
question.option_b: The papilla appears blurred and its border is not visible
question.option_c: The papilla appears sharp-edged but the surrounding area is swollen
question.option_d: The papilla is not visible due to the image quality
